item.title: [onc] Battle Screech
item.description:
Sorcery

Create two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying.

Flashback—Tap three untapped white creatures you control. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [onc] Emeria Angel
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.

item.title: [onc] Elspeth Tirel
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Elspeth

+2: You gain 1 life for each creature you control.

−2: Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

−5: Destroy all other permanents except for lands and tokens.

item.title: [onc] Cut a Deal
item.description:
Sorcery

Each opponent draws a card, then you draw a card for each opponent who drew a card this way.

item.title: [onc] Generous Gift
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

item.title: [onc] Fumigate
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy all creatures. You gain 1 life for each creature destroyed this way.

item.title: [onc] Flawless Maneuver
item.description:
Instant

If you control a commander, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost.

Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

item.title: [onc] Finale of Glory
item.description:
Sorcery

Create X 2/2 white Soldier creature tokens with vigilance. If X is 10 or more, also create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance.

item.title: [onc] Felidar Retreat
item.description:
Enchantment

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —

• Create a 2/2 white Cat Beast creature token.

• Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.

item.title: [onc] Grateful Apparition
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

Whenever Grateful Apparition deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

item.title: [onc] Goldnight Commander
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric Soldier

Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [onc] Ghostly Prison
item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

item.title: [onc] Harmonious Archon
item.description:
Creature — Archon

Flying

Non-Archon creatures have base power and toughness 3/3.

When Harmonious Archon enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.

item.title: [onc] Increasing Devotion
item.description:
Sorcery

Create five 1/1 white Human creature tokens. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, create ten of those tokens instead.

Flashback {7}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [onc] Hour of Reckoning
item.description:
Sorcery

Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)

Destroy all nontoken creatures.

item.title: [onc] Mentor of the Meek
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

Whenever another creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

item.title: [onc] Maul of the Skyclaves
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

When Maul of the Skyclaves enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.

Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and first strike.

Equip {2}{W}{W}

item.title: [onc] Martial Coup
item.description:
Sorcery

Create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. If X is 5 or more, destroy all other creatures.

item.title: [onc] Mace of the Valiant
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each charge counter on Mace of the Valiant and has vigilance.

Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a charge counter on Mace of the Valiant.

Equip {3}

item.title: [onc] Intangible Virtue
item.description:
Enchantment

Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

item.title: [onc] Path to Exile
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [onc] Norn's Annex
item.description:
Artifact

({W/P} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)

Creatures can't attack you or planeswalkers you control unless their controller pays {W/P} for each of those creatures.

item.title: [onc] Midnight Haunting
item.description:
Instant

Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

item.title: [onc] Swords to Plowshares
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

item.title: [onc] Silverwing Squadron
item.description:
Creature — Human Knight

Flying, vigilance

Silverwing Squadron's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

Whenever Silverwing Squadron attacks, create a number of 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance equal to the number of opponents you have.

item.title: [onc] Prava of the Steel Legion
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Cat Soldier

As long as it's your turn, creature tokens you control get +1/+4.

{3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

item.title: [onc] Phyrexian Rebirth
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy all creatures, then create an X/X colorless Phyrexian Horror artifact creature token, where X is the number of creatures destroyed this way.

item.title: [onc] Phantom General
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Soldier

Creature tokens you control get +1/+1.

item.title: [onc] Windborn Muse
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

item.title: [onc] White Sun's Zenith
item.description:
Instant

Create X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens. Shuffle White Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

item.title: [onc] Night's Whisper
item.description:
Sorcery

You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

item.title: [onc] Ichor Rats
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Rat

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

When Ichor Rats enters the battlefield, each player gets a poison counter.

item.title: [onc] Caress of Phyrexia
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player draws three cards, loses 3 life, and gets three poison counters.

item.title: [onc] Painful Truths
item.description:
Sorcery

Converge — You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.

item.title: [onc] Plague Stinger
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Insect Horror

Flying

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

item.title: [onc] Hate Mirage
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose up to two target creatures you don't control. For each of those creatures, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [onc] Dragonmaster Outcast
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

item.title: [onc] Chain Reaction
item.description:
Sorcery

Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.

item.title: [onc] Siege-Gang Commander
item.description:
Creature — Goblin

When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

{1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to any target.

item.title: [onc] Loyal Apprentice
item.description:
Creature — Human Artificer

Haste

Lieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. That token gains haste until end of turn.

item.title: [onc] Legion Warboss
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Soldier

Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token. That token gains haste until end of turn and attacks this combat if able.

item.title: [onc] Hordeling Outburst
item.description:
Sorcery

Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

item.title: [onc] Beast Within
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

item.title: [onc] Mycosynth Fiend
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Horror

Mycosynth Fiend gets +1/+1 for each poison counter your opponents have.

item.title: [onc] Evolution Sage
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

item.title: [onc] Cultivate
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [onc] Carrion Call
item.description:
Instant

Create two 1/1 green Phyrexian Insect creature tokens with infect. (They deal damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

item.title: [onc] Blight Mamba
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Snake

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

{1}{G}: Regenerate Blight Mamba.

item.title: [onc] Viridian Corrupter
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Elf Shaman

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

When Viridian Corrupter enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

item.title: [onc] Scavenging Ooze
item.description:
Creature — Ooze

{G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenging Ooze and you gain 1 life.
